actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy.
Committee on Judiciary requested executive comment from Justice Department.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to restrict the examination of children who apply for naturalization.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to prohibit the naturalization examination of persons under 18 years old unless: (1) the Attorney General determines the likelihood of fraud; or (2) in the case of a child between 15 years old and 18 years old, the Attorney General specifically requires such examination.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to restrict the examination of children who apply for naturalization.
